```{python}
def unix2doty(unix):
    dote = unix / 86400 + 719468
    cykl = (
        dote if dote >= 0
        else dote - 146096
    ) // 146097
    dotc = dote - cykl * 146097
    yotc = (dotc
        - dotc // 1460
        + dotc // 36524
        - dotc // 146096
    ) // 365
    return [
        int(yotc + cykl * 400),
        dotc - (yotc * 365
            + yotc // 4
            - yotc // 100
    )]
unix2doty(1728000000)
```

```{python}
unix2doty(1890000000)
```
